name: Solitarie
description:
A collection of the most popular solitaire games, baKno-style. Beautiful handcrafted card sets are showcased in a 3D view with nice effects and intuitive manipulation. Solitaire includes some all-time favorites such as Klondike, Freecell, Spider, Cruel, Canfield and Tripeaks. A great way to pass time and exercise the mind.

This free version allows you to make 20 moves per game. In order to play unlimited, you need to purchase either a License, some Tokens or a Subscription. All these available as In-App Purchases within the game.
